numbered_ace_sentences: 1. The NBA has the highest percentage of players of color.
2. The WNBA has the highest percentage of players of color.
3. I wonder why the only American-made sport has the lowest diversity percentage.
5. This situation shows that some Americans are still racist in some way.
6. I think that racism happens less in music than in sports.
7. The headline is: Sports and how they are racist.
